code: const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export async function checkGift(code){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/check-gift/").concat(code));const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok){throw new Error(data.error||"Invalid code");}return data;}export async function useGift(code){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/use-gift/").concat(code),{method:"POST"});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok){throw new Error(data.error||"Use failed");}return data;}
